isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - AIR SYSTEM - INSERT VALVE: 8-SPEED "LL" MODELS (EQUIPPED WITH ROADRANGER VALVE A-5015) AND 13-SPEED SPLITTER MODELS

svcproc.title: INSERT VALVE: 8-SPEED "LL" MODELS (EQUIPPED WITH ROADRANGER VALVE A-5015) AND 13-SPEED SPLITTER MODELS
svcproc.para: The insert valve is a self-contained 1-3/16 inch valve assembly located in the reduction or splitter cylinder cover. It CANNOT be disassembled except for the three O-rings on outer diameter. The O-rings provide a stationary seal and do not move in cylinder.

When installing the insert valve in the bottom edge of the cover, apply Fuller #71206 silicone lubricant or its equivalent to the O-rings and cylinder walls. Install the valve in the bore with flat surface to the outside. When installing the special valve retaining nut, apply Fuller #71204 adhesive/sealant or its equivalent to the threads and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART.
